title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with a mysterious woman to escape a warlord and his army. Their journey leads them on a high-speed pursuit across dangerous desert terrain.

title: Die Hard
description: NYPD officer John McClane is caught in a Los Angeles skyscraper during a terrorist takeover. As the building is held hostage, McClane battles to save the lives of the hostages and stop the criminals.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces off against the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to create chaos in Gotham City. Batman must decide how far he is willing to go to stop the Joker's reign of terror.

title: John Wick
description: A retired hitman seeks vengeance against those who killed his beloved dog, a final gift from his late wife. He re-enters the criminal underworld, igniting a relentless pursuit of revenge.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth’s mightiest heroes assemble to stop Loki, the brother of Thor, who is plotting to invade Earth. With the fate of the world at stake, the Avengers must put aside their differences and unite.

title: Gladiator
description: Maximus, a betrayed Roman general, is sold into slavery and becomes a gladiator. He seeks vengeance against Commodus, the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and ruined his life.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
description: A cyborg sent from the future to protect a young boy teams up with his older self’s protector, another cyborg, to prevent the apocalypse, fighting off a relentless, shape-shifting terminator.

title: Speed
description: A cop must prevent a bomb from exploding on a city bus. The bomb is rigged to explode if the bus goes below 50 mph, and the cop must find a way to outsmart the bomber while saving the passengers.

title: Iron Man
description: Tony Stark, a genius billionaire, is captured by terrorists and forced to build a weapon of mass destruction. Instead, he constructs a suit of armor to escape and uses it to protect the world as Iron Man.

title: The Bourne Identity
description: A man with amnesia is found by a fisherman and discovers that he is being pursued by the CIA. With limited memory, he seeks to uncover his past while evading deadly assassins.

title: Mission: Impossible – Fallout
description: Ethan Hunt must work with his team and a CIA agent to recover stolen plutonium, but things go wrong, and Hunt finds himself on the run, facing consequences from past decisions.

title: Casino Royale
description: James Bond embarks on his first mission as a 00 agent to stop a terrorist financier named Le Chiffre. Bond must play poker against him to stop a disastrous financial deal.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker named Neo learns the truth about his reality: it is a simulated world controlled by machines. He joins a group of rebels to fight against the system that controls humanity.

title: The Expendables
description: A group of elite mercenaries, led by Barney Ross, is hired to overthrow a dictator in a fictional South American country. As the mission escalates, they face a deadly confrontation with the dictator’s forces.

title: The Incredibles
description: A family of superheroes must come out of retirement to face a new villain who threatens the world. Together, they use their powers to save the day while dealing with the struggles of family life.
King Leonidas of Sparta leads his army of 300 warriors against the Persian Empire, fighting to the death to protect their freedom and defend their homeland from the overwhelming Persian forces.

title: Black Panther
description: T’Challa returns home to the African nation of Wakanda after the death of his father, the king, to take his rightful place as the Black Panther. He faces challenges from a villain with ties to his family’s past.

title: Lethal Weapon
description: A pair of mismatched detectives, one suicidal and the other a family man, must work together to solve the case of a murdered young woman. They build an unlikely friendship as they take on dangerous criminals.

title: Rambo: First Blood
description: John Rambo, a former Green Beret, is wrongly accused of being a drifter causing trouble in a small town. As he fights to survive against local law enforcement, Rambo’s military training comes to the forefront.

title: The Equalizer
description: Robert McCall, a former black-ops operative, seeks to live a quiet life but is forced back into action when he sees a young woman being exploited by a violent Russian gang. McCall seeks justice in his own way.

title: Se7en (1995)
description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.

title: Gone Girl (2014)
description: A man becomes the prime suspect in the disappearance of his wife, leading to a media frenzy and shocking twists.

title: The Silence of the Lambs (1991)
description: A young FBI agent seeks the help of a cannibalistic serial killer to catch another killer on the loose.

title: Shutter Island (2010)
description: A U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a patient from a mental institution located on an isolated island.

title: Prisoners (2013)
description: When two children go missing, a father takes matters into his own hands while the police follow a set of clues.

title: Zodiac (2007)
description: A political cartoonist, a reporter, and a pair of detectives investigate the infamous Zodiac killer in San Francisco.

title: The Sixth Sense (1999)
description: A young boy who can see and communicate with the dead is helped by a child psychologist.

title: Fight Club (1999)
description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club with a soap salesman that soon grows into a dangerous cult.

title: Memento (2000)
description: A man suffering from short-term memory loss attempts to solve the mystery of his wife’s murder while using notes and tattoos to track his progress.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2011)
description: A journalist and a hacker team up to uncover the truth behind a long-unsolved disappearance within a powerful family.

title: The Prestige (2006)
description: Two magicians engage in a bitter rivalry that leads them to use increasingly dangerous tricks and deceptions.

title: The Others (2001)
description: A woman lives in an isolated mansion with her two children, who are sensitive to light, but strange events start occurring.

title: No Country for Old Men (2007)
description: A hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and takes a briefcase filled with money, putting his life in danger as a ruthless hitman pursues him.

title: The Bone Collector (1999)
description: A quadriplegic detective and a rookie cop team up to track down a serial killer who leaves disturbing clues at crime scenes.

title: The Town (2010)

title: Cape Fear (1991)

description: A controversial documentary by Michael Moore that critiques the Bush administration's handling of 9/11 and the Iraq War.

title: March of the Penguins (2005)
description: A visually stunning documentary following emperor penguins on their annual journey in Antarctica.

title: Icarus (2017)
description: A gripping Netflix documentary that uncovers the Russian doping scandal in the Olympics.

title: The Fog of War (2003)
description: A deep look into war strategies and decision-making through the perspective of former U.S. Secretary of Defense Robert McNamara.

title: Seaspiracy (2021)
description: Explores the environmental impact of global fishing industries and the hidden dangers of overfishing.
